a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Northern hemisphere temperatures over the long run, deviation from
Unit 1 'The capitalist revolution’ Section 1.5 'The economy and the environment' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available
Note: Since 1900, average temperatures have risen in response to increasingly high levels of greenhouse gas concentrations. CC-BY-ND-NC
